schemas.grooveshark:
{
  "type": "object",
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-03/schema",
  "required": true,
  "properties": {
    "header": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": true,
      "properties": {
        "sessionID": {
          "type": "string",
          "required": true
        },
        "wsKey": {
          "type": "string",
          "required": true
        }
      }
    },
    "method": {
      "enum": [
        "addUserLibrarySongs",
        "getUserLibrarySongs",
        "addUserLibrarySongsEx",
        "removeUserLibrarySongs",
        "getUserPlaylistsSubscribed",
        "getUserPlaylists",
        "getUserFavoriteSongs",
        "removeUserFavoriteSongs",
        "logout",
        "authenticateToken",
        "getUserInfo",
        "getUserSubscriptionDetails",
        "addUserFavoriteSong",
        "subscribePlaylist",
        "unsubscribePlaylist",
        "getCountry",
        "getPlaylistInfo",
        "getPopularSongsToday",
        "getPopularSongsMonth",
        "pingService",
        "getServiceDescription",
        "undeletePlaylist",
        "deletePlaylist",
        "getPlaylistSongs",
        "getPlaylist",
        "setPlaylistSongs",
        "createPlaylist",
        "renamePlaylist",
        "authenticate",
        "getUserIDFromUsername",
        "getAlbumsInfo",
        "getAlbumSongs",
        "getArtistsInfo",
        "getSongsInfo",
        "getDoesAlbumExist",
        "getDoesSongExist",
        "getDoesArtistExist",
        "authenticateUser",
        "getArtistVerifiedAlbums",
        "getArtistAlbums",
        "getArtistPopularSongs",
        "getPlaylistSearchResults",
        "getAlbumSearchResults",
        "getSongSearchResults",
        "getArtistSearchResults",
        "getStreamKeyStreamServer",
        "getSongURLFromTinysongBase62",
        "getSongURLFromSongID",
        "getPlaylistURLFromPlaylistID",
        "getTinysongURLFromSongID",
        "getUserPlaylistsByUserID",
        "getUserInfoFromUserID",
        "getSimilarArtists",
        "startSession",
        "getTrialInfo",
        "createTrial",
        "getAutocompleteSearchResults",
        "getSubscriberStreamKey",
        "markStreamKeyOver30Secs",
        "Subscriber streams",
        "markSongComplete",
        "getAutoplaySong",
        "getAutoplayTags",
        "startAutoplayTag",
        "startAutoplay",
        "removeVoteUpAutoplaySong",
        "voteUpAutoplaySong",
        "removeSongFromAutoplay",
        "addSongToAutoplay",
        "voteDownAutoplaySong",
        "removeVoteDownAutoplaySong",
        "getSongIDFromTinysongBase62",
        "registerUser"
      ],
      "required": true
    },
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": true,
      "properties": {
        "oneOf": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

methods.description: All possible methods are send with this POST request.

documentation.title: Headline
documentation.content: Grooveshark is a Web-based music streaming service. Users upload digital audio files, which can then be streamed and organized in playlists. The Grooveshark website has a search engine, music streaming features, and a music recommendation system.
